ngoy.hyperml

Class HtmlComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • hyperml.base.BaseMl<T>
      • hyperml.base.HtmlCore<T>
        • hyperml.base.HtmlBase<NgoyHtmlBase<T>>
          • ngoy.hyperml.base.NgoyHtmlBase<T>
            • ngoy.hyperml.base.HtmlBaseComponent<Html>
              • ngoy.hyperml.HtmlComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnCompileStyles, OnRender

    public abstract class HtmlComponent
extends HtmlBaseComponent<Html>
implements OnRender, OnCompileStyles
    Base class for code-only components using Html.
